forgotPassword.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please check and try again.
forgotPassword.emailSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordLimitReached: You have reached the limit for password reset requests. Please try again later.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password

resetPassword.invalidToken: The reset password token is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.passwordResetError: Error resetting password. Please try again.
resetPassword.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in.
resetPassword.title: Reset Password

signIn.description: Sign in to your account to continue
signIn.signInError: Error signing in. Please check your credentials and try again.
signIn.title: Sign In

signOut.signOutError: Error signing out. Please try again.
signOut.signOutSuccess: You have been signed out successfully.

signUp.activationCodeSent: An activation code has been sent to your email
signUp.activationCodeSentError: Error sending activation code. Please try again.
signUp.activationError: Error activating account. Please check your activation code and try again.
signUp.activationSuccess: Activation successful. You can now set your password.
signUp.description: Create a new account to get started
signUp.descriptionActivationCode: Enter the activation code sent to your email
signUp.descriptionSetPassword: Set your password to complete the registration
signUp.setPasswordError: Error setting password. Please check your details and try again.
signUp.setPasswordSuccess: Password set successfully. You can now sign in.
signUp.title: Create an Account
signUp.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

validation.activationCodeMinLength: Your one-time password must be at least 6 digits.
validation.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.passwordMustContainUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
